title: Glycochemical Synthesis - Strategies and Applications
description:
Glycochemical Synthesis - Strategies and Applications - Shang-Cheng Hung, Medel Manuel L. Zulueta (Wiley, 2016).pdf

This book is a comprehensive and concise review on principles, strategies, and crucial advances in glycochemistry. It focuses on synthesis and practical applications and emphasizes state-of-the-art approaches to the assembly and design of sugars.

â€¢    Provides detailed discussion on specific topics like oligosaccharide assembly and design of sugars, techniques in glycoconjugate preparation, multivalency, and carbohydrate-based drug design
â€¢    Uses notable examples, like solution-based one-pot methods and automated methods for sugar assembly, to illustrate important concepts and advances in a rapidly emerging field
â€¢    Discusses practical applications of carbohydrates, like medicine, therapeutics, drug and vaccine development
